title: Warhammer 40k 7th edition rulebook
description:
Hi there, this is 7th edition rulebook, as always I was not the one who created this PDF, I am just very good at finding stuff in web. Quality may not be the best 'cause it was created from epub version of this awesome 7th edition,I really like it guys, everything I wanted to have in Warhammer 40000 is in this rulebook, for example magic phase was upgraded a lot. 
You can finally summon Daemons in battle! Even the almighty ones such as Great Unclean One or even entire squad of Bloodletters of Khorne! I would like to spoiler more but it would spil your fun on discovering what's new =)

If you like it and have cash remember to buy original version of rulebook to support Games Workshop.

PS: I will upload epub version soon, need to check it first.
